### Construct a Survey for Mixing

1. Outline a mixed study where a survey is necessary for data collection

2. Create a ten item survey in [Qualtrics](wvu.ca1.qualtrics.com/)

3. Save it as [**QSF**](https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/survey-module/survey-tools/import-and-export-surveys/#ExportingaSurveyasaQSF) file

4. Create a short presentation describing your mixed study detailing the methods

5. Add your name to both files 

6. Submit both files the channel <a href="https://edp618fall2022.slack.com/archives/C04301TTQ9J" target="_blank" style='color:#ff8384;'>#wk5-survey</a> by Sunday (11/25/2022) at 11:59 PM

7. Review all submissions prior to next week's class and be prepared to critique each

### Develop a Draft

Please begin and finish work on the third deliverable after recieving feedback on the your second submission. More details can be found [here](/deliverables/03-l3/)
